channel.title: Hosting...?
channel.description:
Ok i've been thinking about getting a host for my server, cause my computer is just about out of memory, and it makes my computer freeze up alot. But i would like to know all the details about what a host does, and how to get one and what to do when you get one. Please help me out! :o
Btw if your intrested in hosting my server email me at [email]fivenames6@msn.com[/email] You will become an owner, and wil have tons of other advantages too! ;D

item.title: Hosting...?
item.dc:creator: @Wildy321 Wildy321
item.description:
@Wildy321 wrote:

How much does it cost?

Read full topic

item.title: Hosting...?
item.dc:creator: @Obuntu Obuntu
item.description:
@Obuntu wrote:

You need to buy a Windows VPS or a Windows Dedicated Server

VPS is basically a Virtual Server - you can run .EXE’s on it so thats fine.
Dedicated is basically another computer but has a good CPU/RAM. - Better than VPS.

Read full topic
